Material: BRONZE ?; COPPER ?; BONE; UNSPECIFIED ROCK; SLATE
Name: Mirror
Description: Round copper mirror, attached to the handle by a tang. The part in between is made of bone. The shaft of the handle is shaped like a papyrus and is made of speckled green serpentinite, with a crosspiece of grey slate. Part of the crosspiece has broken off. The mirror is very elegant.
